= Building Soar =

If you wish to manually build Soar rather than downloading [Download pre-compiled binaries], for example if you want to make modification or extensions to the architecture, you can perform the following steps:

  * *Step 1*: Get the source code for !SoarSuite by either downloading it or checking it out from our version control repository.
    * [BuildGetSource Instructions for getting the source code]
  * *Step 2*: Follow the build instructions for your particular operating system
    * [BuildWindows Windows Build Notes]
    * [BuildLinux Linux Build Notes]
    * [BuildMac Mac OS X Build Notes]
  * *Step 3*: Set up Eclipse if you plan to use it for development _(optional)_
    * [ConfigEclipse Instructions for configuring Eclipse]
